amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used to enforce part 429 or 430 of title 10, Code of Federal Regulations, with respect to showerheads.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to enforce part 429 or 430 of title 10, Code of Federal Regulations, with respect to showerheads.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Schweikert.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
